full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 197 of 236 1101 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 Q. And there was also someone who was going to take photographs of the house and the evidence that was collected; right? 2 A. True. 3 Q. And that person was named Kim Paveolic (ph.); right? 4 A. True. 5 Q. And there was yourself? 6 A. True. 7 Q. And your role was to videotape the reading of the warrant, the beginning of the search; right? 8 A. True. 9 Q. And also videotape the security sweep of the house when you first entered? 10 A. True. 11 Q. And then to videotape the walk-through of the residence after the security sweep had been performed? 12 A. True. 13 Q. And then do an exit video after the fact; right? 14 A. True. 15 Q. And you generally supervised the team; is that right? 16 A. They -- we were operating independently. 17 Q. So the search warrant that you executed we said was October 20th, 2005; right? 18 A. True. 19 Q. That is the day that you shot the video that we looked at SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018298
